title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Robinson R44 Raven II - new helicopter flight dynamics
description:
In this video we will look at the Robinson R44 Raven II helicopter. The helicopter itself is known already by a lot of simmers since it has been around already for a while. However this new version has a huge advantage, it is using the new helicopter flight dynamics which are part of the 40th anniversary edition. I think this results in this is currently the only community addon heli which has this huge advantage.

If you want to give the helicopter a try download it via the link below:
https://flightsim.to/file/45703/robinson-r44-raven-ii-helicopter-40th-anniversary-edition

Also make sure you installed PMS50's GTN 750 if you didn't install it yet:
https://pms50.com/msfs/
